thread.title: EzPaycheck Payroll Software Now Offers Tax Preparers More Flexibility
thread.title_full: EzPaycheck Payroll Software Now Offers Tax Preparers More Flexibility

author: PRWEB
title: EzPaycheck Payroll Software Now Offers Tax Preparers More Flexibility
text:
ezPaycheck software developer’s have listened to accountant and tax preparer suggestions and added a new paid preparer business information setup screen to forms 940 and 941. Detroit, MI (PRWEB) July 21, 2015
Halfpricesoft.com developer’s have just released an updated version of ezPaycheck 2015 to accommodate tax preparers. Accountants, CPAs and tax professionals that need to fill in paid preparer information on form 940 and 941 will benefit from this enhancement. With this new feature, tax professionals and accountants can input their information once and utilize it for all of their clients! This saves a great amount of time and frustration.
“ezPaycheck software developer’s have listened to accountant and tax preparer suggestions and added a new paid preparer business information setup screen to forms 940 and 941.” said Dr. Ge, the founder of halfpricesoft.com.
EzPaycheck software was designed to automate paycheck processing to save time for small to mid size business owners. Because it is so flexible, many accountants and tax professionals also like this payroll and check printing software. The software allows for simple setup of employee information, importing data, calculating payroll - including calculation of federal, state and local taxes; deductions for Medicare, insurance and 401(k) plans; and printing paychecks. Potential customers can download and try this software at no cost or obligation at http://www.halfpricesoft.com/payroll_software_download.asp
Customers will appreciate all these features in the latest release of ezPaycheck payroll software:
· Multiple accounts under one business name without additional charges
. Allows tax professionals and accountants to add their information once and use repeatedly
· Assign multiple shift rates to each employee — great for employees who work different shifts or different jobs within the business
· Unlimited employee capacity — no need to upgrade or purchase more capacity when more employees are added
· Easily apply and track commissions on sales
· Track tips and cash collected and include on paychecks
· Easy-to-use graphical interface is user friendly and ideal for businesses without a dedicated IT administrator or accountant on staff
· No accounting background required
Priced at $89 per calendar year, ezPaycheck payroll software is affordable for any size business owner.
Customers seeking a way to simplify payroll processing with more accuracy to start the no obligation 30-day test drive today at: http://www.halfpricesoft.com/index.asp
About Halfpricesoft.com
Founded in 2003, Halfpricesoft.com has established itself as a leader in meeting and exceeding the software requirements of small businesses around the world. Offering payroll software, employee attendance tracking software, check writing/printing software, W2 software, 1099 software and ezACH deposit software. It continues to grow in the philosophy that small business owners deserve affordable, user friendly, and totally risk-free software.
